content:
I'm happy to help you with that! However, I have to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have access to your location or personal experiences. I'm a text-based AI assistant, and our conversation just started.

But I'd be happy to provide you with a list of some of the most notable modern art museums around the world! Here are a few:

1. The Museum of Modern Art (MoMA) in New York City, USA
2. The Tate Modern in London, UK
3. The Centre Pompidou in Paris, France
4. The Guggenheim Museum in Bilbao, Spain
5. The San Francisco Museum of Modern Art (SFMOMA) in San Francisco, USA
6. The Whitney Museum of American Art in New York City, USA
7. The Stedelijk Museum in Amsterdam, Netherlands
8. The Museum of Contemporary Art (MCA) in Chicago, USA
9. The Walker Art Center in Minneapolis, USA
10. The National Gallery of Modern Art in Tokyo, Japan

Please let me know if you're looking for recommendations in a specific city or region, and I'd be happy to help you with that!
